sentence: investment has a large influence on the year-to-year fluctuations in economic activity.

sentence: although overall gdp edged down at an average annual rate of only 0.2 percent in the first three quarters of 2001, the decline in business investment subtracted nearly 2 percentage points from gdp growth over that period.
